name: Better Call Saul but its a ps1 game
name_original: Better Call Saul but its a ps1 game
description:
I saw a video on YouTube where people joked about a PS1 adaption of Better Call Saul, so I decided to make a goofy representation of what that would look like.

This current build only allows you to explore a very weird rendition of Jimmy's office, but considering it took 10 scene files just to make that, I think that's a good first prototype.

The game currently runs at 320x240p but soon I'll add a different resolution option

(maybe an n64 mode as well, who knows.)
